column5: OPK We havent touched 2 a share in 12 days Its already been 119 days since the last print of 3 250 days since the 4 level Its been a whopping 900 days since the last time an OPK shareholder could say we hit a new 52week high today And lastly its been onethousand fourhundred and sixtyone days since the OPK alltime high of 1920 Yes the alltime high occurred when tymtested was getting ready to enter Junior High school Its been THAT long
